name: 摩美々
text: ──なんかぁ、恋鐘の部屋ってピンクだよねー
trans: It dawned on me... just how pink your room is, Kogane.

name: 恋鐘
text:
いきなりなんね～～？
うちの部屋、今日が初めてやなかやろ？
trans:
Watcha talkin' about~~?
This ain't the first time ya've been in my room, right?

name: 摩美々
text: でも、いつもは他に誰かしらいるでしょー
trans: But before I've always been here with the others, y'know?

name: 摩美々
text:
改めて見ると、
なんかピンクだなぁって
trans: So now that I get a better look... It really is a lot of pink.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふぇ……
なんか、恥ずかしか～……！
trans:
Huh...?
Shucks, hearin' all that gets me feelin' embarrassed...!

name: 恋鐘
text: そいやったら、摩美々の部屋は何色～？
trans: So what color's your room, Mamimi?

name: 摩美々
text: 色、あんまりないかもー
trans: There's not much color to it to be honest.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ん～～？
そがんことある～？
trans:
Hmm?
There are rooms like that?

name: 摩美々
text:
……ていうか
こたつ、入っていいー？
trans:
Anyways...
Is the kotatsu all ready?

name: 恋鐘
text:
よかよ～
あったまっとるけん

name: 恋鐘
text:
摩美々、寝ると……！？
せっかくうちまで来たとに……
trans:
You goin' to sleep, Mamimi?!
But ya only just got here...

name: 恋鐘
trans: It's not that ya can't but...

name: 摩美々
text:
──じゃー恋鐘
なんか面白い話でもしてよー

name: 恋鐘
trans:
Yeah~!
Imma come up with somethin'~!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ん～と……
摩美々、昨日はなんしよったと～？
trans:
Hmm... Uhh...
...Sooo didya do anythin' yesterday, Mamimi?

name: 摩美々
text:
仕事
恋鐘も一緒だったでしょー？
trans:
Work.
Weren't you with me yesterday, Kogane?

name: 恋鐘
text:
そ、そうやったね……
……って、そうじゃなか！
trans:
O-Oh... You're right...
...So that's what happened!

name: 恋鐘
text:
仕事の後とか～
色々あったやろ～？
trans: So what didya do right after work?

name: 摩美々
text:
ふぁ……
あ、もー、眠気が限界……
trans:
Yawn...
Ahh... Yeeaah, it's lights out for me...

name: 恋鐘
text:
……そ、そいやったら！
なんか曲でもかけるね～！
trans:
...Oh, in that case!
Imma play some songs for ya~!

name: 恋鐘
text: 摩美々のリクエストあると～？

name: 摩美々
text:
なんでもー
なんか、恋鐘の好きな曲で
trans:
Juuust play whatever.
Or... I guess your favorite song.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ん～……
そいじゃあ、これ！
trans:
Hmmm~
Then let's go with... this!

name: 恋鐘
text:
有名なラブソングやけん
聴いたことあるやろ～？
trans:
This is a famous love song!
Haven't ya heard of it~?

name: 摩美々
trans:
Well...
I can't say that I have.

name: 恋鐘
text:
え～
絶対聴いたらわかるばい！
trans:
Whaaaa?!
Maybe it'll come to ya if you give it a listen!

name: 恋鐘
text: うち、ここのフレーズが好きとよ

name: 恋鐘
trans: "Your eyes are the color of the cosmos"

name: 恋鐘
trans: "I don't understand, but I love you" ~!

name: 恋鐘
text: 聴いたことあったやろ？

name: 摩美々
trans: ...Yeah, I never heard of it after all.

name: 恋鐘
trans:
...Bummer.
Still, isn't it a good song?
